title.rendered: Luxury Pools highlights outdoor design expertise from Eldorado Stone

content.rendered: A premier outdoor living publication written for a high-end audience interested in a custom home swimming pools, Luxury Pools features Eldorado Stone’s Mezzaluna Artisan Fire Bowl as well as Eldorado Outdoor patios in the 2015 Fall/Winter issue. Within the “Cozy Up” article, the Mezzaluna Artisan Fire Bowl is listed as a piece that can add tranquility to any outdoor space. In the “Playing With Fire” piece, Eldorado Outdoor patios are stunningly showcased in two images along with an article explaining the value of incorporating fire features into an outdoor patio entertainment space.
